name: MRK Leasing
tag_list: equipment-leasing, it-leasing, equipment-leasing-company, equipment-financing, barcode-scanners, technology-repair, it-repair, leasing, equipment-solutions, financing-company, data-capture, warehouse-equipment, rfid-equipment, mobile-data-collection-devic
overview:
MRK Leasing is an equipment leasing and financing company that is an industry leader in the AIDC/barcode scanner marketplace. Specializing in information technology, data capture, and warehousing equipment.

MRK Leasing is a nationwide provider of affordable and flexible Information Technology (IT) equipment leasing and financing solutions for small, mid-size, and large businesses. We offer full life cycle equipment solutions for all your leasing needs with a flexible, customized approach to each transaction.

What we finance: Printers Barcode / Handheld Scanners RFID Equipment / Asset Tracking Forklifts Mobile Data Collection Devices Information Technology VOIP/ Telecommunications Warehouse Equipment
